channel.title: CVE Feed for uClibC -- uClibC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for uClibC -- uClibC

item.title: CVE-2022-29503|2024-08-03T06:26:06.246Z -- uclibc -- uclibc
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the libpthread linuxthreads functionality of uClibC 0.9.33.2 and uClibC-ng 1.0.40. Thread allocation can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can create threads to trigger this vulnerability.
